genresAdvancedInfo.name: men's choir
genresAdvancedInfo.description: Men's choir is a type of choral music that is sung exclusively by men. It is typically performed in four-part harmony and can range from traditional hymns to contemporary pop songs. Men's choir music is often associated with religious or patriotic events and is performed by groups ranging from small ensembles to large choirs.
